name: Bankless
title: Is Crypto AI in Danger? Chinaâ€™s $6M DeepSeek vs. ChatGPT & Nvidia
text:
Synopsis
The emergence of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI model, represents a significant technological breakthrough that challenges existing AI development paradigms by demonstrating 45x more computational efficiency and potentially disrupting the AI and crypto landscape through open-source innovation.

Key Insights
- DeepSeek, a Chinese AI model, was developed for approximately $6 million and competes with top AI models like ChatGPT
- Key technological innovations include:
  - More efficient data training methodology
  - Ability to review and improve model outputs with less computational resources
  - "Mixture of experts" approach that routes queries to specific model sections
- The model is open-sourced, which could accelerate AI development globally
- Major tech companies like Open AI and Perplexity are developing AI agent products
- Salana blockchain is emerging as a potential hub for AI agent development
- Virtuals, an AI agent protocol, is expanding to Salana blockchain
- Venice, a privacy-focused AI platform by Eric Vorhees, launched its token and was quickly listed on Coinbase
- The AI crypto sector remains heavily influenced by macro economic conditions and narrative-driven market dynamics
- Jevons Paradox suggests that increased AI efficiency might actually increase overall compute demand rather than reduce it
